description.value: Irori challenges you to adapt to adversity in order to perfect yourself. You become weighed down as if under heavy weights, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Encumbered]{Encumbered} until you accomplish a challenging task of Irori's choosing.
